org.drip.analytics.cashflow

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.cashflow.Bullet

  • public class Bullet
extends java.lang.Object
    Bullet holds the point realizations for the latent states relevant to terminal valuation of a bullet cash flow.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy

        iFXFixingDate - The FX Fixing Date for non-MTM'ed Cash-flow

        strPayCurrency - Pay Currency
